Attacks.Name: Pound
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, Wigglytuff gains power equal to the damage dealt.

Attacks.Name: Dazzling Gleam
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, enemy characters within Range 2 of the target suffer 1 damage.

Attacks.Name: Sing
Attacks.Effect: Choose an enemy character within Range 2. The target gains the Stun special condition. Wild: The target also gains the Stagger condition.

Superpowers.Name: Cute Charm
Superpowers.Effect: When an enemy character targets Wigglytuff with a physical attack and rolls a wild, the attacking character gains the Stagger special condition.

Superpowers.Name: Rollout
Superpowers.Effect: Place Wigglytuff within Range 3. After placement, enemy characters within Range 1 of Wigglytuff suffer 1 damage.

Superpowers.Name: Competitive Spirit
Superpowers.Effect: When Wigglytuff or an allied character within Range 2 is attacked and suffers damage, Wigglytuff gains 1 power.

Attacks.Name: Moonblast
Attacks.Effect: If this attack deals damage, the target gains the Stagger special condition.

Superpowers.Name: Healing Song
Superpowers.Effect: Remove 2 damage from Wigglytuff and all allied characters within Range 2.

Superpowers.Name: Hyper Voice
Superpowers.Effect: Enemy characters within Range 3 suffer -1 defense die until the end of the round.
